We need a high-level decoding object, that exposes standard strategies, such as SVC, Ridge (with optional feature screening, and integrated parameter selection).

@schwarty : I believe that you have prototyping code that goes in this direction, maybe we can look at that in detail at the sprint.
title: Decoding object

text: This decoding object needs to be able to take a classifier, but have a standard one. Most importantly, it needs to be flexible wrt cross-validation objects. Different experiments and different analyses require very different cross-validation strategies.
